fullText: The production succeeds in finding fresh meaning in this tale of sexual awakening and tragic repression, while honoring the passion and energy that made the original so compelling.
dtliExcerpt: The production succeeds in finding fresh meaning in this tale of sexual awakening and tragic repression, while honoring the passion and energy that made the original so compelling.
bwwExcerpt: True, it may take a few minutes to process the process, as it were. A mild case of sensory overload may have you reeling in the opening minutes, as you adjust to the necessity of taking it all in, and figuring out where to focus your concentration at any given moment. But a heady dose of sensory overload is what the best musicals deliver anyway; that's why people become obsessed with them. Here it's just different elements that contribute to the sensation.
